articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Breed-fish Ground and Fish Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Breed-fish Ground and Fish Farm
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission, gave field guidance to the Sokmak Atlantic Salmon Breed-fish Ground and Raksan Offshore Salmon Fish Farm under KPA Unit 810.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Sokmak Atlantic Salmon Breed-fish Ground.
					
					 He went round hatchery, fry breeding room, fry fattening room, water filtering place, indoor and outdoor ponds and other places of the ground to learn in detail about the work there.
					
					 "It is great that the ground is capable of hatching more than 4.3 million fishes in a year", he said, adding that this has laid a solid foundation for breeding offshore salmon in a big way with a high ambition.
					
					 "What is the most important in fish breeding is to solve the water problem and it is good for the ground to have built the processes for filtering water and disinfecting and oxygenating it on the basis of cutting-edge technology to ensure the most ideal water temperature and quality and establish a scientific and general water supply and recycling system", he stressed.
					
					 Noting that the ground is breeding fishes of various species such as rainbow trout in the indoor and outdoor ponds by letting even the water used for hatching and breeding fries flow into indoor and outdoor ponds, he said this was the example to be followed by all other fish breeding units of the country in introducing water-saving style fish-farming.
					
					 Calling on the ground to work hard to attain a higher goal on the basis of the achievements already made, he gave important instructions which would serve guidelines in its management and operation such as the issue of rounding off Korean-style hatching method, the issue of deepening the research into preventing the degeneration of breed salmon and the issue of updating fish-breeding facilities on a higher level.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Raksan Offshore Salmon Fish Farm.
					
					 He looked round the net ring fishing ground, aquiculture tank, salmon processing room and other places of the farm to learn in detail about the production and fish processing there.
					
					  He said that it was an untrodden path for the farm to conduct offshore salmon breeding but officials and employees of the field concerned and the farm have opened a prospect for offshore salmon breeding through a dynamic drive.
					
					 "It is praiseworthy for the farm to have made success in breeding not only salmon but also freshwater rainbow trout by acclimatizing it to sea water," he noted.
					
					 He said that he was pleased to see processed salmon including smoked salmon, pickled salmon roe and slices of boiled salmon at the salmon processing room.
					
					 He noted that it is necessary to push forward the fish breeding and aquiculture in a big way in order to develop the fishing industry and channel great efforts into offshore fish breeding and aquiculture in particular, adding that the prospect and future for them lie in going out to the sea.
					
					 Pointing out that the seas of the country are not contaminated and their ecological environment is clean, he stressed the need to make the best use of the conditions favorable for the fish breeding and aquiculture and thus make the country proudly rank itself among the advanced countries in the offshore fish breeding and aquiculture.
					
					 He said that well begun is half done and the farm has made a good start, calling on it not to give up offshore salmon breeding halfway with depression and hesitation but dynamically push ahead with it in order to implement the behest of leader Kim Jong Il and live up to the expectation of the people without fail. He encouraged the officials and employees of the farm, promising to settle everything arising in the work of the unit.
					
					 He had a photo session with officials and employees of Unit 810 of the KPA, Sokmak Atlantic Salmon Breed-Fish Ground and Raksan Offshore Salmon Fish Farm.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il, Jo Yong Won and Jang Chang Hwa.

articles.title: Greetings to Eritrean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Eritrean President
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Saturday sent a message of greeting to Issaias Afewerki, president of Eritrea, on the occasion of the 24th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed the belief that friendly relations between the DPRK and Eritrea would grow stronger and sincerely wished the Eritrean president successes in his work and the Eritrean people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: International Women's Grand March Starts
articles.content:
International Women's Grand March Starts
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The 2015 international women's grand march for reunification and peace in Korea started here.
					 A starting ceremony took place before the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification on Saturday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People who doubles as chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, women in Pyongyang and members of a delegation to the 2015 international women's grand march for reunification and peace in Korea.
					
					 Irish anti-war peace activist Maguire Mairead addressed the ceremony.
					
					 She expressed on behalf of the delegation bitter feelings towards the untold sufferings and disasters suffered by the Korean women, which are attributable to the past Korean war and the war moves that persisted even after the war.
					
					 She noted that many members of the delegation are from the countries which either joined the war or are responsible for Korea's division that has lasted seven decades.
					
					 She underscored the need to make the disaster of the war as past thing.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 She expressed belief that the grand march would serve as an important occasion for eliciting more international support for reunification and peace in Korea and demonstrating the united strength of women.
					
					 And a declaration of the international women's grand march for reunification and peace in Korea was read out.
					
					 The declaration said that the progressive women in the world would advance hand in hand with the Korean women and continue the grand march for lasting peace and security in the world.
					
					 The participants left for Kaesong amid warm congratulations of women in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Socialist Emulation Facilitates Immediate Farming
articles.content:
Socialist Emulation Facilitates Immediate Farming 
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Organizations under the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) at all levels are pushing ahead with a socialist emulation for speeding up the immediate farm work.
					 Officials of the Pyongyang City and Jagang Provincial committees of the UAWK are effectively using loudspeaker cars and other agitation equipment to rev up the atmosphere in the fields. 
					
					 The UAWK organizations in North Phyongan Province, South Hwanghae Province and other areas are sponsoring the emulation for securing water sources in close touch with the relevant units to prevent the draught damage and ensure safe farming.
					
					 UAWK officials in Ryokpho District, Pyongyang, and Paechon and Jaeryong counties are sincerely helping farmers to register successes in their work.
					
					 The socialist emulation among co-op farms, workteams and sub-workteams organized by the Sinyang County Committee of the UAWK helped the mountainous county prove successful in rice-transplantation.
					
					 Thanks to strong backing from officials of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the UAWK the farmers of the 2nd workteam of the township co-op farm in Jungsan County could round off the rice-transplantation by Tuesday.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition Marks Anniversary of Chongryon
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition Marks Anniversary of Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition on the theme of "Under banner of Juche and patriotism" opened to mark the 60th anniversary of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 On display at the exhibition hall are photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who made great contributions to the formation and development of Chongryon and those of Marshal Kim Jong Un who has wisely guided the movement of Koreans in Japan in the new century of Juche.
					
					 Also on show were photos showing the 60 year-long history of Chongryon and the efforts made by its officials and other Koreans in Japan to usher in its new heyday.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture on May 23.
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party, Kim Jin Guk, director of the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs, officials of ministries and national institutions and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Also present there were members of a group of Koreans in Japan for expressing thanks to the homeland on the 60th anniversary of Chongryon led by Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, a delegation of Chongryon veteran officials led by Pak Jong Sang, adviser to the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, and other Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin made an opening address.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Heightening Vigilance against U.S. Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Heightening Vigilance against U.S. Moves
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article calls upon the international community to clearly see through the harm and danger of the U.S. cruel and crafty moves and wage a dynamic drive to oppose and shatter them.
					 The history of the U.S. is one of aggression, war and plunder, and misinformation and plots are the crafty methods to which it always resorts, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 There are not a few plot-breeding organizations in the U.S.
					
					 CIA specializes in such swindles and intrigues as faking up and spreading all sorts of information data needed for aggression, military intervention and regime change.
					
					 Whenever the U.S. fabricated and spread false information, the sovereignty of independent states were encroached upon and stamped out, innocent people bled and peace and stability were upset.
					
					 It is the brigandish method of the U.S. to exercise military high-handedness against the anti-U.S. independent countries, calling into question their steps for bolstering up the capabilities for self-defense.
					
					 Asserting that its nuclear weapons and WMDs are "means for peace", the U.S. contends the steps taken by the independent countries to bolster up defence capabilities should not be tolerated as they are an "act of abetting terrorism and threatening peace".
					
					 The U.S. is becoming all the more pronounced in its moves against the DPRK. But the DPRK will remain unfazed by any plots of the U.S.

articles.title: Minju Joson Raps Park Geun Hye's Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Raps Park Geun Hye's Invectives against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea in an opening address on May 19 claimed that the north's recent test-fire of SLBM was part of its "reign of terror" and "it shocked the international community", grumbling "it is escalating military tension". She went the lengths of letting loose a spate of nonsensical outbursts that someone's "nuclear threat" and "provocation" are "hamstringing the growth in Asia".
					 Minju Joson Saturday in a commentary terms it a poor burlesque to cover up her true colors as a fascist fanatic and divert the world criticism of her to the DPRK.
					
					 The commentary brands Park as a top-class pro-U.S. lackey and traitor and maniac escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north as she vociferated about someone's "increasing military tension" by echoing what the U.S. blustered, without trying to know who has ensured peace on this land and prevented the outbreak of a nuclear war for decades.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is the arch criminal shocking the world with horror politics, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Park group dreaming of the revival of "yusin" dictatorship is setting in motion all repressive machines in a bid to tide over its serious ruling crisis. It is creating a terror-ridden atmosphere throughout south Korea under the pretext of security. 
					
					 All facts prove once again that Park and her yes men are the worst trouble-makers who should be eliminated at an early date as they are doing everything bad.
					
					 Park will have to pay a very high price for her reckless tongue-lashing.

articles.title: Kerry's Hectic Diplomacy Would Get U.S. Nowhere: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Kerry's Hectic Diplomacy Would Get U.S. Nowhere: KCNA Commentary
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- U.S. Secretary of State Kerry, at a joint press conference in the wake of his junket to Beijing, talked rubbish that the DPRK's nuclear and missile development programs pose threat to regional peace and it will stand ever more isolated economically unless it drops its ambition for developing nuclear weapons.
					 What Kerry said is no more than sheer sophism let loose by aggressors taken aback by the ever-increasing military muscle of the DPRK.
					
					 As already reported, the DPRK has recently succeeded in test-fire of SLBM, a shining product of its Songun (army-first) line and line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 The successful test-fire of SLBM was part of the measures being taken by the service personnel and people of the DPRK to bolster up its capability for self-defence and marked a fresh higher stage in the development of strategic strike means.
					
					 Its acquisition of the SLBM launch technology helped the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have access to a world-level strategic weapon and made it possible for them to successfully conduct underwater operations to wipe out the hostile forces keen to encroach upon its sovereignty and dignity in any waters.
					
					 It is quite natural for all the undesirable forces to raise a hue and cry over the above-said successful test-fire, not an easy project even for big powers.
					
					 Notably, Washington must feel very uneasy due to heavy mental stress. 
					
					 It is not in a position to complain about the measure for self-defence taken by the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. has resorted to undisguised nuclear blackmail against the DPRK. It ceaselessly staged nuclear war drills aimed at "eliminating the leadership of the DPRK" and "occupying Pyongyang" after bringing nuclear carrier and group of warships to the South Sea of Korea and the Pacific.
					
					 Power-backed high-handed and arbitrary practices have prevailed in the international arena and the U.S. has persistently encroached upon the sovereignty of other countries for decades.
					
					 Had the DPRK not taken the road of bolstering up its capability for self-defence with the nuclear deterrent as its pivot under such grave situation, it would not have protected the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation nor would it have been possible to think about the building of an economic power.
					
					 The on-going situation goes to clearly prove what a just option the DPRK took.
					
					 No matter what confab the U.S. may stage here and there against the DPRK, seized with an anachronistic wild ambition, its unfavorable position can never improve.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever bolster up its capability for self-defence with the nuclear force as its pivot, holding higher the banner of simultaneously developing the two fronts, undeterred by the U.S. smear campaign.
					
					 With no gimmick can the U.S. realize its wild ambition for encroaching up the sovereignty of the DPRK and bringing down its dignified social system.
					
					 It would be well advised not to misjudge its rival.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group of S. Korea Urged to Step down
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group of S. Korea Urged to Step down
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on May 18 demanding the Park Geun Hye group step down.
					 Speakers said that two members of the solidarity who had been in action outside Chongwadae were walked away to the Jongro Police Station in Seoul on May 16.
					
					 Other members were also taken to the police station for the reason that they held press conferences before the station in protest against it on May 16 and 18, they said.
					
					 "Yusin" dictatorial rule is reviving by Park who took office through election coup, 35 years since the military coup by Chun Doo Hwan, they deplored.
					
					 They urged Park to step down as she seized power through fraudulent election, buried 304 south Koreans at sea, dissolved a progressive party and is suppressing patriotic young people.
					
					 They demanded Park apologize to the people for her wrongdoings.

articles.title: Disbandment of "Preparatory Committee for Unification" Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Disbandment of "Preparatory Committee for Unification" Urged in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea called a press conference outside the puppet "preparatory committee for unification", a plot-breeding body against reunification, in demand of its disbandment on May 18. 
					 The solidarity referred to the fact that on May 10 it sent an open questionnaire to Park Geun Hye whether she had the willingness to dismiss Jong Jong Uk, vice-chairman of the committee, and lift the "May 24 step" or not but she gave no answer to it.
					
					 This means that she intends to unify the country through absorption, it held.
					
					 It urged the "government" to give up the daydream of "unification by absorption" and disband the committee at once.

articles.title: S. Koreans Call for Successful Joint National Event
articles.content:
S. Koreans Call for Successful Joint National Event
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Taejon preparatory committee for the joint national event to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration held a press conference in Taejon on May 19.
					 Speakers said that all people should pool their efforts to successfully hold the joint national event in Seoul in order to achieve peace and national reunification in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 They said that the "government" should take practical actions for reunification and, to this end, lift the "May 24 step".
					
					 They underscored the need to bring about a comprehensive turn in cooperation and exchange and the improvement of the relations between the south and the north.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams U.S. for Bringing War Crisis
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams U.S. for Bringing War Crisis
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a meeting outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on May 19 denouncing the U.S. for bringing a war crisis.
					 They said that the intention of the "Self-Defence Forces" to reinvade the Korean peninsula is confirmed in different clauses of the "defence cooperation guidelines" that had recently been revised by the U.S. and Japan and that is why they are calling for the abrogation of the guidelines.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 After the revision of the guidelines, the U.S. secretary of State flew into south Korea where he alleged "it is necessary to deploy THAAD because of the north's threat". This reflects his intention to push ahead with the deployment of THAAD in south Korea and form U.S.-Japan-south Korea tripartite military alliance .
					
					 They demanded the U.S. no longer force south Korea to deploy THAAD.

articles.title: Respiratory Epidemic Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Respiratory Epidemic Spreads in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Respiratory epidemic broke out in S. Korea, according to its KBS.
					 A man who had been to a Mideast country was confirmed infected with Mideast respiratory syndrome called MERS.
					
					 His wife was also infected and similar symptom was found in an old man in 70s who stayed at the same room.
					
					 Dozens of medical workers who were treating the patient were all quarantined to be checked for infection.
					
					 It was reported that 40 percent of those infected reportedly lost their lives worldwide.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Suppression of Chongryon Denounced
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Suppression of Chongryon Denounced
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, on May 18 made public a statement. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have so far suppressed Koreans in Japan, victims of the colonial rule by Japan, far from making an apology and compensating for the crimes against humanity they committed against the Korean nation even though seven decades have passed since the defeat of Japan. This is an unprecedented human rights abuse, an act of national discrimination and an unpardonable provocation against the DPRK. 
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China bitterly denounce the brutal arrest of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should properly understand the will of the whole Korean nation and behave themselves. 
					
					 The Korean nation which still bear grudge against the Japanese imperialists, the sworn enemy, will certainly force them to pay for the blood shed by Koreans and for the crimes they are still committing.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should clearly see the daily mounting hostility of Koreans towards Japan and stop at once the reckless anti-DPRK and anti-Chongryon moves and release the arrested officials of Chongryon immediately. 
					
					 They have to make an unconditional apology for the unprecedented violence against humanity.

articles.title: Young Koreans in China Denounce Japan's Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Young Koreans in China Denounce Japan's Suppression of Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China will never pardon the Japanese reactionaries' suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), the dignified overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK, and Koreans in Japan.
					 The federation said this in a statement on May 18.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' arrest of Chongryon officials and search of their houses are a grave provocation and unpardonable human rights abuses against the Korean nation. 
					
					 Their unlawful suppression of Chongryon was aimed at justifying the extension of independent "sanctions" against the DPRK by stirring up the atmosphere against the DPRK and Chongryon in the Japanese society. 
					
					 They perpetrated such suppression at a time when the enthusiasm for unity and patriotism are running high among the compatriots' organizations in Japan in the run-up to the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon. This vividly showed how desperately the Japanese reactionaries are working to crack down on and obliterate Chongryon and overseas Koreans.
					
					 They can never break the will of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan firmly rallied around the DPRK but harden their will for decisive resistance.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Magazine
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Magazine
						
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Komsomolskaya Pravda, the Russian newspaper agency, on May 8 carried an article on its magazine for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Russia's victory in the Great Patriotic War under the title of "Model of Internationalists" illustrated with the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and photos showing his external activities. 
					 The magazine referred to the fact that the President supported the Soviet Union with arms in the crucial period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 He gave an active helping hand to the Chinese revolutionaries during the anti-Japanese war, it said, and went on:
					
					 He extended full support and solidarity to the Cuban people in the early 1960s and rendered all forms of assistance to the country.
					
					 And when the Gulf of Tonkin incident occurred in August 1964 he supported and encouraged the Vietnamese people in the war against the aggression by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 His noble internationalism influenced the Cambodian and Lao peoples' struggle for national salvation against the U.S. as well as the struggle of Arab countries including Egypt and Syria against Zionism.
					
					 He lighted the road to be followed by the African people in their efforts for national liberation, rendered possible support to them and brought about independence and new independent era to Africa that had been called "dark continent".
					
					 More than 20 years have passed since he passed away but he is always alive in the heart of progressive mankind as a noble model of internationalists.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre criadero de reproduccion de peces y empresa pesquera adscritos a unidad 810 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre criadero de reproduccion de peces y empresa pesquera adscritos a unidad 810 del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el criadero de reproduccion de salmon de Oceano Atlantico de Sokmak y la Empresa Pesquera de Salmon Maritimo de Raksan, adscritos a la unidad 810 del EPC.
					Estuvo primero en el criadero de reproduccion de salmon de Oceano Atlantico de Sokmak.
					
					Recorriendo la sala de incubacion, la de cria de pececillos, la de ceba de alevinos, el lugar de filtracion de agua, los criaderos bajo techo y al aire libre y otros, hizo detallado conocimiento del estado del criadero.
					
					Al decir que es notable que la capacidad anual de la incubacion del criadero es mas de 4 millones 300 mil alevinos, alabo el coraje extraordinario con lo cual ha preparado la firme base capaz de desarrollar la cria de salmon maritimo.
					
					Dijo que lo mas importante en la piscicultura es agua. Es loable que ese criadero mantiene la temperatura y calidad de agua tan ideales tras acondicionar el filtrador y esterilizante de agua mas modernos y el proceso de saturacion de oxigeno y establecio el cientifico y general sistema de aseguramiento y recirculacion de agua, apunto.
					
					Se refirio a que alli utiliza el agua usada en la incubacion y la cria de alevinos en los criaderos bajo techo y al aire libre para la trucha irisada y otros peces, lo que es el modelo del pais en la piscicultura con poco agua.
					
					Senalo que a base de los exitos alcanzados ya en el criadero, se debe presentar la meta mas elevada y esforzarse por cumplirla y dio las instrucciones preciosas que sirven de guia en la  gestion y las actividades empresariales del criadero inclusive el problema de perfeccionar el metodo propio de recoleccion de huevos y semen e incubacion, el de profundizar la investigacion para prevenir la degeneracion de salmon madre, el de realizar la modernizacion de instalaciones necesarias a la cria de peces y otros.
					
					Seguidamente, el Mariscal dirigio las labores de la Empresa Pesquera de Salmon Maritimo de Raksan.
					
					En el criadero en corral, la sala de elaboracion de salmon y otros lugares, hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de la produccion y elaboracion de peces de la empresa.
					
					Dijo que los funcionarios y los empleados de la empresa se empenaron por abrir la perspectiva de la cria de salmon maritimo aunque lo hacian por primera vez.
					
					Senalo que es loable el hecho de que la empresa logro exitos tanto en la cria de salmones como en la de salmon irisada de agua dulce aclimatandolos en el mar.
					
					Subrayo que le alegra mucho al ver en la sala de elaboracion los articulos procesados de salmon tales como el salmon ahumado, lonja de su carne y otros.
					
					Destaco que para desarrollar la industria pesquera hace falta realizar en gran escala la piscicultura y el cultivo, sobre todo, esforzarse por la cria y cultivo maritimos y anadio que para abrir la perspectiva de la cria de peces y el cultivo deben salir  al mar.
					
					Al recordar que nuestros mares no estan contaminados y es limpio el ambiente ecologico, enfatizo que se deben utilizar al maximo las condiciones favorables a la piscicultura y el cultivo, para que nuestro pais sea uno de los paises avanzados en la cria y el cultivo maritimos.
					
					Una vez que se dio ya primer paso, deben impulsar sin abandonar la cria de salmon maritimo para materializar sin falta el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y responder a la esperanza del pueblo y el mismo solucionara todos los problemas que se presentan en las labores de la unidad 810 del EPC, asevero
					
					El Mariscal se retrato con los funcionarios y empleados de la unidad 810 del EPC, el criadero y la empresa.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il, Jo Yong Won y Jang Chang Hwa.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 24o aniversario de Independencia de Eritrea
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 24o aniversario de Independencia de Eritrea 
						
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este sabado un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente del Estado de Eritrea, Issaias Afewerki, con motivo del 24o aniversario de la independencia de este pais. 
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas, el remitente deseo de todo corazon los exitos en el trabajo del destinatario y el progreso y prosperidad al pueblo de Eritrea.

articles.title: Ceremonia de partida de gran marcha internacional de mujeres en Pyongyang
articles.content:
Muchachas coreanas sobresalen en campeonato regional de CAF
						
Pyongyang, 25 de mayo (ACNC) -- Las futbolistas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ocuparon el primer lugar en el campeonato regional (Asia Oriental) de futbol sub-14 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2015 efectuado desde el dia 19 en China.
					El torneo fue efectuado dividido en dos grupos con la participacion de 8 paises y regiones inclusive la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Taipei de China.
					
					El equipo coreano perteneciente al grupo B vencio en la semifinal a su rival japones por 3:0.
					
					Y en la final efectuada el dia 24, rechazo al equipo chino por 2:0.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion fotografica por 60o aniversario de constitucion de Chongryon
articles.content:
Publicada en Polonia obra de Kim Jong Un
						
Pyongyang, 25 de mayo (ACNC) -- La pagina web de Polonia "Republica Popular Democratica de Corea" publico el dia 19 la obra del Mariscal Kim Jong Un "La conservacion del patrimonio nacional es una labor patriotica destinada a hacer valer la historia y la tradicion de nuestra nacion".
					El trabajo, publicado el 24 de octubre del 103 (2014) de la Era Juche, senala que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dieron gran importancia a la conservacion del patrimonio nacional en todo el curso de su direccion sobre la revolucion y concentraron las fuerzas en este trabajo para glorificar a todo el mundo la larga historia y la brillante cultura de la nacion coreana.
					
					E indica las tareas para defender las inmortales hazanas del Presidente y el Dirigente y glorificar mas la historia y la tradicion de la nacion coreana al materializar cabalmente la politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en materia de conservacion del patrimonio nacional.
